name: claude-code
description: A marketplace with my Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: epcc-workflow
plugins.description: EPCC (Explore-Plan-Code-Commit) systematic development workflow with 12 agents for exploration, planning, coding, and commit phases

plugins.name: documentation
plugins.description: Diataxis documentation framework with 12 agents for tutorials, how-tos, references, explanations, and analysis

plugins.name: pr-review
plugins.description: A PR review agents specializing in comments, tests, error handling, type design, code quality, and code simplification

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Frontend design skill for creating distinctive, production-grade UI/UX implementations

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Create and validate Claude Code skills with proper directory structure and SKILL.md templates using Anthropic's proven skill-creator scripts
